languages.text: Grants unit a 30% reduction of all incoming damage, except damage of the Shock, Energy and Warp types and increases it's Weapon Skill by 40.

traits.locale_text: Grants unit a 30% reduction of all incoming damage, except damage of the Shock, Energy and Warp types and increases it's Weapon Skill by 40.

languages.text: This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is increased by +40. It suffers −30% less damage, except energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.
